name: Fantasy Quest Solitiare
description:
Are you ready to face this challenge? Play your cards right in almost 100 Solitaire levels and save the Fairy Land. 4 courageous elves will help you with their magical powers!

  • Premium Solitaire Card-Game
  • Almost 100 engaging Solitaire levels
  • Numerous power-ups and useful wild cards
  • Show your wits in exciting Match 3 mini games
  • Conquer 3 awesome adventure levels
  • Master 3 tricky hidden object levels
  • Play through 3 challenging puzzle levels
  • Solve critical time management quests
  • Entertaining mini games of various genres
  • Beautiful particle and sound effects
  • Hand-drawn art by Marie Beschorner
